Package leikr.managers

Class GraphicsManager

java.lang.Object
leikr.managers.GraphicsManager
public class GraphicsManager
extends java.lang.Object
Manages the drawing API for Engine.

    • tint

      public void tint()
      Removes the applied tint color from the previous tint methods: tint(org.mini2Dx.core.graphics.Color) tint(int) tint(java.lang.String) This isn't very obvious.

    • getPixel

      public org.mini2Dx.core.graphics.Color getPixel​(java.math.BigDecimal x, java.math.BigDecimal y)
      Convenience method to retrieve a color at a specified pixel coordinate of the frame buffer. note that the y coordinate parameter must be -1 in order to get the correct pixel.
      Parameters:
      x -
      y -
      Returns:
      The Color at the specified coordinate of the frameBuffer
